sinks.name: TEE_Free
sinks.reason: Missing input validation could lead to undefined behavior if a tainted pointer is passed.

sinks.name: TEE_Malloc
sinks.reason: Missing input validation on size parameter could lead to buffer overflows or memory corruption.

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Potential for unencrypted output to Normal World if dest is shared

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Missing input validation could lead to buffer overflows or out-of-bounds access
